quote: “If we ever forget that we're one nation under God, then we will be one nation gone under.”
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: “It was like the beginning of life and laughter. It was the real meaning of the sun”
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: “Can you remember who you were, before the world told you who you should be?”
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: “Desperation is the raw material of drastic change. Only those who can leave behind everything they have ever believed in can hope to escape. ”
author: William S. Burroughs

quote: “Until you step into the unknown, you don’t know what you’re made of.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “I have no right to say or do anything that diminishes a man in his own eyes. What matters is not what I think of him but what he thinks of himself. Hurting a man in his dignity is a crime.”
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: “The beautiful journey of today can only begin when we learn to let go of yesterday.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “What would you do if you weren't afraid?”
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: “All great achievements require time.”
author: Maya Angelou

quote: “You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future.”
author: Steve Jobs

quote: “Don't wait for the right moment to start, start and make each moment right.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Don’t wait for things to happen. Make them happen.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “I don't fit into any stereotypes. And I like myself that way.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain!”
author: Dolly Parton

quote: “...Next time you're faced with a choice, do the right thing. It hurts everyone less in the long run.”
author: Wendelin Van Draanen

quote: “He who would learn to fly one day must first learn to walk and run and climb and dance; one cannot fly into flying. ”
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: “Faith is the bird that feels the light and sings when the dawn is still dark.”
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: “Words save our lives, sometimes.”
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: “We should not judge people by their peak of excellence; but by the distance they have traveled from the point where they started.”
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: “Believe there is a great power silently working all things for good, behave yourself and never mind the rest.”
author: Beatrix Potter

quote: “Hate looks like everybody else until it smiles”
author: Tahereh Mafi

quote: “Step follows step,Hope follows Courage,Set your face towards danger,Set your heart on victory.”
author: Gail Carson Levine

quote: “If you enter this world knowing you are loved and you leave this world knowing the same, then everything that happens in between can be dealt with.”
author: Michael  Jackson

quote: “Stop doing what is easy. Start doing what is right.”
author: Roy T. Bennett
